729315f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Amboy Road
729315f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Amboy
Road. The house belonged to L. Potesta (1898 map) and to
Selmo Abdelnour (1907).
May 16, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REFRODUCTIONS

729314f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Amboy Road
729314f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, north side, west of Amboy Road, showing a
late nineteenth century home.
P.L. Sperr  April 30, 1933
NO REPRODUCTIONS
